title: Crosby claims about Old World diseases

content.question: In the excerpt, Crosby makes which of the following claims about the transmission of Old World diseases to the Americas?

choices.label: It had minimal effect on Native Americans.
It was an unintended consequence of contact between the New World and the Old World.

content.answer: It was an unintended consequence of contact between the New World and the Old World.
